Articles.Content:
[RELEASE THREAD](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/123578)

So here's a model I found online that I thought I'd quickly convert over for KSP, seeing as how there are a lack of Antares/Cygnus mods here.

So far Cygnus is done, no idea whether or not I'll do the rocket also, maybe, maybe not. I did this on a whim so I may not even ever update it again, just giving fair warning.

<iframe class="imgur-album" frameborder="0" height="550" src="//imgur.com/a/bNy8J/embed?background=ffffff&text=1a1a1a&link=4e76c9" width="100%"></iframe>

**Credits**

-Original Cygnus model: Don Gallagher

-Circular Solar Panels Model: Yogui87 BY-NC-SA

**Edited <time datetime="2015-12-03T12:06:41Z" title="12/03/2015 12:06  PM" data-short="8 yr">December 3, 2015</time> by diomedea**
  
corrected link to Imgur album
Nice raidernick- I will give it a spin.

Ohh noice! Wait....

![d9S7rcu.png](http://i.imgur.com/d9S7rcu.png)My Antares plus that Cygnus? The Antares was originally for DarthVader, but now, we could just put the Antares and Cygnus here...say if you are interested raidernick, if so, I will talk to DarthVader.

UPDATE V0.2

-Added Cygnus Extended version

-Fixed docking port being off center and reversed normals

-Increased life support capacity

-Added craft files

![w21IeZH.png](http://i.imgur.com/w21IeZH.png)

![vt6rd66.png](http://i.imgur.com/vt6rd66.png)

Good idea. My original plan with my Castor 30 was to produce something I wanted that was low quality, and have the public convince an amazing modder to make a great one. With this project, raider nick has done this.
This has been officially released here: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/123578](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/123578)
